room_title: Escape room "The Western Saloon Robbery" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: Very fun and challenging. We did the Saloon and the Scene of the Crime. The Saloon was definitely more challenging, but I think the crime scene was more fun. I'm giving this place 4 stars because we have been to three total escape rooms, and this is by far the most expensive.

room_title: Escape room "The Western Saloon Robbery" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: We participated in the Western Saloon themed one. I definitely would recommend, the room was not extremely difficult (although we used all 3 clues) and the service was very friendly, helpful, and funny!We had a group of 4 adults and 2 kids.Both the kids and the adults really enjoyed themselves.

room_title: Escape room "The Western Saloon Robbery" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: Great team building event!  The room and clues made in exciting and fun for each team member.  Enjoyed the ability to work together, seek solutions, and laugh during the time in the room.  The room was challenging, but you had the ability to have 3 extra clues as required if the team needed them.

room_title: Escape room "The Western Saloon Robbery" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: We had a great time! We made it out with time to spare! Thanks Donovan!

room_title: Escape room "The Western Saloon Robbery" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: So much fun!!! We came for a business team building event it was a blast!!! I will be back with my freinds!!
